name: Nijito
description:
Nijito is a rhythm mobile game where you play the whole band! Control a set of skilled musicians who can switch instruments mid-song -- you never miss out on paying the coolest part in the coolest way!

Hop into social reality and join a tight-nit group of friends on their journey to turn Nijito into the biggest, best-est band the world has ever seen!

(The is...assuming that nobody suddenly leaves the band, or is hiding some grand lie which would change everything, or has some impossible to overcome deep-seated trauma undermining them, or gets into an all or-nothing showdown with a vicious rival...but that'd never happen, right? Right?!)

For updates and more, check out our twitter account here.
